item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, November 3, 2024 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Project Sid: Many-agent simulations toward AI civilization (84 points | 13 comments)
2. Touchscreens are out, and tactile controls are back (562 points | 418 comments)
3. The Confusing State of RCS (24 points | 7 comments)
4. Hacker News Data Map (7 points | discuss)
5. ToolGit: A collection of scripts that extend Git with various sub-commands (45 points | 30 comments)
6. pg_flo – Stream, transform, and re-route PostgreSQL data in real-time (63 points | 11 comments)
7. The DeskThing: the perfect desk assistant (61 points | 34 comments)
8. Programming Languages That Blew My Mind (2023) (88 points | 37 comments)
9. Show HN: Replacicon – Create and customize app icons on macOS (6 points | discuss)
10. gptel: a simple LLM client for Emacs (24 points | 5 comments)
11. Missing open-source contributor presents a dilemma when accepting their PR (31 points | 20 comments)
12. GoGoGrandparent (YC S16) Is Hiring Back End and Full-Stack Engineers ( | hide)
13. Create block devices on your computer backed by Redstone Memory (135 points | 26 comments)
14. A React Renderer for Gnome JavaScript (91 points | 40 comments)
15. Unix core utilities implemented in Haskell (173 points | 62 comments)
16. Future Music magazine is closing after 32 years (19 points | 4 comments)

18. Speed, scale and reliability: 25 years of Google datacenter networking evolution (226 points | 47 comments)
19. Programming NetBIOS on OS/2 (24 points | discuss)
20. Redox OS gets RISC-V support (7 points | discuss)
21. Get me out of data hell (563 points | 238 comments)
22. Big Data for the Leviathan (36 points | 6 comments)
23. Coordinated Community Response Mitigates Fediverse Spam Attack (21 points | 1 comment)
24. Turn your phone or tablet into a chess clock (22 points | 27 comments)
25. The motor turns too much (354 points | 166 comments)
26. Top discoveries about ancient people from DNA in 2023 (8 points | discuss)
27. Venvstacks: Virtual Environment Stacks for Python (88 points | 36 comments)
28. Ractor – a Rust Actor Framework (134 points | 64 comments)
29. Matrix 2.0 Is Here (209 points | 80 comments)
30. Uranus' moon Miranda may have an ocean beneath its surface (9 points | 1 comment)
